page.title: 08A CHILD'S SCHOOL DAY
page.content: I get up at 7.30 a.m. on{Monday} and I have my breakfast which is Frosties. Then I get dressed for{school.}When I have done this I go down to watch TV AM for an hour. I get my bag ready for school. Then I leave my house at 8.50a.m. I wait for the{bell}to go at 9.00a.m. then we come in.We start our work with{English.}When we have done this we do{Maths.}Then we go to have our lunch. I have some sandwiches,a packet of crisps,a biscuit and an apple. When we have had our lunch we go out to play. When we come in from play we do some more{project}work.At 2.05p.m. we go out to play till 2.25p.m.. Then we have{singing}then we go home. At home I have my tea and then watch Fame. For my tea I have mash and rice with stew. For my pudding I have ice cream. Then I go to bed after watching Fame.
